80.plot: After finding out Marcelos true reasons for coming to Puebla, Alonzo forbids Lucia to have anything to do with Marcelo. When Alonzo tries to kick Rebecca out of his house she tells him that she is responsible for Adrianna's (his first wife) death. He suffers from a heart attack and Rebecca takes the medication from his hands to ensure his death.

locations: Televisa San Angel, Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: Rebeca is in love with her brother-in-law, and is determined that if she can't be happy, then no one can be. Years later, Lucia and Marcelo meet at the worst time of their respective lives and find comfort in each other. But their happiness doesn't last long as those around them plot and scheme to keep them apart.
imdb.title: The Color of Passion
plot: A woman is married to the owner of a Talavera factory in a world where everyone is happy

Rebeca is in love with her brother-in-law, and is determined that if she can't be happy, then no one can be. Years later, Lucia and Marcelo meet at the worst time of their respective lives and find comfort in each other. But their happiness doesn't last long as those around them plot and scheme to keep them apart.::AmethystUnycorn
